verses.verse: וַתִּתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <S%H6419><s%> prayed חַנָּה֙ <S%H2584><s%> And Hannah וַתֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and said עָלַ֤ץ <S%H5970><s%> rejoiceth לִבִּי֙ <S%H3820><s%> My heart בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD רָ֥מָה <S%H7311><s%> is exalted קַרְנִ֖י <S%H7161><s%> mine horn בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD רָ֤חַב <S%H7337><s%> is enlarged פִּי֙ <S%H6310><s%> my mouth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against א֣וֹיְבַ֔י <S%H341><s%> over mine enemies כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because שָׂמַ֖חְתִּי <S%H8055><s%> because I rejoice בִּישׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3444><s%> in thy salvation

אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> There קָד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> [There is] none holy כַּיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Indeed אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is no בִּלְתֶּ֑ךָ <S%H1115><s%> for [there is] none beside וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> one צ֖וּר <S%H6697><s%> thee neither [is there] any rock כֵּאלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> like our God

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no תַּרְבּ֤וּ <S%H7235><s%> no more תְדַבְּרוּ֙ <S%H1696><s%> Talk גְּבֹהָ֣ה <S%H1364><s%> so exceeding גְבֹהָ֔ה <S%H1364><s%> proudly יֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> come עָתָ֖ק <S%H6277><s%> let [not] arrogancy מִפִּיכֶ֑ם <S%H6310><s%> out of your mouth כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> is a אֵ֤ל <S%H410><s%> [is] a God דֵּעוֹת֙ <S%H1844><s%> of knowledge יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD [וְלֹא כ] (וְלֹ֥ו <S%H3808><s%> not ק) נִתְכְּנ֖וּ <S%H8505><s%> are weighed עֲלִלֽוֹת׃ <S%H5949><s%> and by him actions

קֶ֥שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> The bows גִּבֹּרִ֖ים <S%H1368><s%> of the mighty men חַתִּ֑ים <S%H2844><s%> [are] broken וְנִכְשָׁלִ֖ים <S%H3782><s%> and they that stumbled אָ֥זְרוּ <S%H247><s%> are girded חָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> with strength

שְׂבֵעִ֤ים <S%H7649><s%> [They that were] full בַּלֶּ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> themselves for bread נִשְׂכָּ֔רוּ <S%H7936><s%> have hired out וּרְעֵבִ֖ים <S%H7457><s%> and [they that were] hungry חָדֵ֑לּוּ <S%H2308><s%> ceased עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Even עֲקָרָה֙ <S%H6135><s%> so that the barren יָלְדָ֣ה <S%H3205><s%> hath born שִׁבְעָ֔ה <S%H7651><s%> seven וְרַבַּ֥ת <S%H7227><s%> and she that hath many בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> children אֻמְלָֽלָה׃ <S%H535><s%> is waxed feeble

יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מֵמִ֣ית <S%H4191><s%> killeth וּמְחַיֶּ֑ה <S%H2421><s%> and maketh alive מוֹרִ֥יד <S%H3381><s%> he bringeth down שְׁא֖וֹל <S%H7585><s%> to the grave וַיָּֽעַל׃ <S%H5927><s%> and bringeth up

יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מוֹרִ֣ישׁ <S%H3423><s%> maketh poor וּמַעֲשִׁ֑יר <S%H6238><s%> and maketh rich מַשְׁפִּ֖יל <S%H8213><s%> he bringeth low אַף־ <S%H637><s%> and מְרוֹמֵֽם׃ <S%H7311><s%> lifteth up

מֵקִ֨ים <S%H6965><s%> He raiseth up מֵעָפָ֜ר <S%H6083><s%> out of the dust דָּ֗ל <S%H1800><s%> the poor מֵֽאַשְׁפֹּת֙ <S%H830><s%> from the dunghill יָרִ֣ים <S%H7311><s%> [and] lifteth up אֶבְי֔וֹן <S%H34><s%> the beggar לְהוֹשִׁיב֙ <S%H3427><s%> to set עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with נְדִיבִ֔ים <S%H5081><s%> [them] among princes וְכִסֵּ֥א <S%H3678><s%> the throne כָב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> of glory יַנְחִלֵ֑ם <S%H5157><s%> and to make them inherit כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [are] the LORD'S מְצֻ֣קֵי <S%H4690><s%> for the pillars אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וַיָּ֥שֶׁת <S%H7896><s%> and he hath set עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and תֵּבֵֽל׃ <S%H8398><s%> the world

רַגְלֵ֤י <S%H7272><s%> the feet [חֲסִידֹו כ] (חֲסִידָיו֙ <S%H2623><s%> godly ק) יִשְׁמֹ֔ר <S%H8104><s%> He will keep וּרְשָׁעִ֖ים <S%H7563><s%> and the wicked בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> in darkness יִדָּ֑מּוּ <S%H1826><s%> shall be silent כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> by בְכֹ֖חַ <S%H3581><s%> for by strength יִגְבַּר־ <S%H1396><s%> prevail אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> shall no man

יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יֵחַ֣תּוּ <S%H5181><s%> be broken [מְרִיבֹו כ] (מְרִיבָ֗יו <S%H7378><s%> adversary ק) [עָלֹו כ] (עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and ק) בַּשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> out of heaven יַרְעֵ֔ם <S%H7481><s%> shall he thunder יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> upon them the LORD יָדִ֣ין <S%H1777><s%> shall judge אַפְסֵי־ <S%H657><s%> the ends אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְיִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and he shall give עֹ֣ז <S%H5797><s%> strength לְמַלְכּ֔וֹ <S%H4428><s%> unto his king וְיָרֵ֖ם <S%H7311><s%> and exalt קֶ֥רֶן <S%H7161><s%> the horn מְשִׁיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H4899><s%> of his anointed פ

וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went אֶלְקָנָ֛ה <S%H511><s%> And Elkanah הָרָמָ֖תָה <S%H7414><s%> to Ramah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> to his house וְהַנַּ֗עַר <S%H5288><s%> And the child הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> did מְשָׁרֵת֙ <S%H8334><s%> minister אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before עֵלִ֥י <S%H5941><s%> Eli הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> the priest

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> Now the sons עֵלִ֖י <S%H5941><s%> of Eli בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> [were] sons בְלִיָּ֑עַל <S%H1100><s%> of Belial לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> they knew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> not the LORD

וּמִשְׁפַּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> custom הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> And the priests' אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> with the people כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any אִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [was that] when any man זֹבֵ֣חַ <S%H2076><s%> offered זֶ֗בַח <S%H2077><s%> sacrifice וּבָ֨א <S%H935><s%> came נַ֤עַר <S%H5288><s%> servant הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> the priest's כְּבַשֵּׁ֣ל <S%H1310><s%> was in seething הַבָּשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> while the flesh וְהַמַּזְלֵ֛ג <S%H4207><s%> with a fleshhook שְׁלֹ֥שׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> of three הַשִּׁנַּ֖יִם <S%H8127><s%> teeth בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand

וְהִכָּ֨ה <S%H5221><s%> And he struck בַכִּיּ֜וֹר <S%H3595><s%> [it] into the pan א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בַדּ֗וּד <S%H1731><s%> or kettle א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בַקַּלַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H7037><s%> or caldron א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בַפָּר֔וּר <S%H6517><s%> or pot כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after יַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> brought up הַמַּזְלֵ֔ג <S%H4207><s%> all that the fleshhook יִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> took הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest בּ֑וֹ כָּ֚כָה <S%H3602><s%> Thus יַעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> for himself So they did לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> unto all the Israelites הַבָּאִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> that came שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there בְּשִׁלֹֽה׃ <S%H7887><s%> in Shiloh

גַּם֮ <S%H1571><s%> Also בְּטֶרֶם֮ <S%H2962><s%> before יַקְטִר֣וּן <S%H6999><s%> Also before they burnt אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֵלֶב֒ <S%H2459><s%> the fat וּבָ֣א ׀ <S%H935><s%> came נַ֣עַר <S%H5288><s%> servant הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest's וְאָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said לָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the man הַזֹּבֵ֔חַ <S%H2076><s%> that sacrificed תְּנָ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> Give בָשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh לִצְל֖וֹת <S%H6740><s%> to roast לַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> for the priest וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> he will not יִקַּ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> for he will not have מִמְּךָ֛ <S%H4480><s%> at בָּשָׂ֥ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh מְבֻשָּׁ֖ל <S%H1310><s%> sodden כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo חָֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> of thee but raw

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> about הָאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And [if] any man קַטֵּ֨ר <S%H6999><s%> unto him Let them not fail יַקְטִיר֤וּן <S%H6999><s%> to burn כַּיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> presently הַחֵ֔לֶב <S%H2459><s%> the fat וְקַ֨ח־ <S%H3947><s%> and [then] take לְךָ֔ כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after תְּאַוֶּ֖ה <S%H8378><s%> dainty נַפְשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H5315><s%> [as much] as thy soul וְאָמַ֥ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> then he would answer [לֹו כ] (לֹא֙ ק) כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> inasmuch עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> now תִתֵּ֔ן <S%H5414><s%> him [Nay] but thou shalt give וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> No לָקַ֥חְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> [it me] now and if not I will take בְחָזְקָֽה׃ <S%H2394><s%> [it] by force

וַתְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> Thus חַטַּ֧את <S%H2403><s%> Wherefore the sin הַנְּעָרִ֛ים <S%H5288><s%> of the young men גְּדוֹלָ֥ה <S%H1419><s%> great מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> was very אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for נִֽאֲצוּ֙ <S%H5006><s%> abhorred הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H582><s%> for men אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מִנְחַ֥ת <S%H4503><s%> the offering יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וּשְׁמוּאֵ֕ל <S%H8050><s%> But Samuel מְשָׁרֵ֖ת <S%H8334><s%> ministered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD נַ֕עַר <S%H5288><s%> [being] a child חָג֖וּר <S%H2296><s%> girded אֵפ֥וֹד <S%H646><s%> ephod בָּֽד׃ <S%H906><s%> with a linen

וּמְעִ֤יל <S%H4598><s%> coat קָטֹן֙ <S%H6996><s%> him a little תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> made לּ֣וֹ אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> Moreover his mother וְהַעַלְתָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> and brought ל֖וֹ מִיָּמִ֣ים ׀ <S%H3117><s%> [it] to him from year יָמִ֑ימָה <S%H3117><s%> to year בַּֽעֲלוֹתָהּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> when she came up אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אִישָׁ֔הּ <S%H376><s%> with her husband לִזְבֹּ֖חַ <S%H2076><s%> to offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶ֥בַח <S%H2077><s%> sacrifice הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> the yearly

וּבֵרַ֨ךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed עֵלִ֜י <S%H5941><s%> And Eli אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶלְקָנָ֣ה <S%H511><s%> Elkanah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <S%H802><s%> and his wife וְאָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said יָשֵׂם֩ <S%H7760><s%> give יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לְךָ֥ זֶ֙רַע֙ <S%H2233><s%> thee seed מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> of this woman הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> in תַּ֚חַת <S%H8478><s%> place הַשְּׁאֵלָ֔ה <S%H7596><s%> for the loan אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁאַ֖ל <S%H7592><s%> which is lent לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD וְהָלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> And they went לִמְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> unto their own home

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> And פָקַ֤ד <S%H6485><s%> visited יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַנָּ֔ה <S%H2584><s%> Hannah וַתַּ֛הַר <S%H2029><s%> so that she conceived וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and bare שְׁלֹשָֽׁה־ <S%H7969><s%> three בָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> and two בָנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> daughters וַיִּגְדַּ֛ל <S%H1431><s%> grew הַנַּ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> And the child שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

וְעֵלִ֖י <S%H5941><s%> Now Eli זָקֵ֣ן <S%H2204><s%> old מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> was very וְשָׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> and heard אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יַעֲשׂ֤וּן <S%H6213><s%> did בָּנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> all that his sons לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> unto all Israel וְאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> they יִשְׁכְּבוּן֙ <S%H7901><s%> and how they lay אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הַנָּשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> with the women הַצֹּ֣בְא֔וֹת <S%H6633><s%> that assembled פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> [at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

אַ֖ל <S%H408><s%> No בָּנָ֑י <S%H1121><s%> Nay my sons כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for לֽוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not טוֹבָ֤ה <S%H2896><s%> for [it is] no good הַשְּׁמֻעָה֙ <S%H8052><s%> report אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I שֹׁמֵ֔עַ <S%H8085><s%> that I hear מַעֲבִרִ֖ים <S%H5674><s%> to transgress עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> ye make the LORD'S

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יֶחֱטָ֨א <S%H2398><s%> sin אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> If one man לְאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> against another וּפִֽלְל֣וֹ <S%H6419><s%> shall judge אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> the judge וְאִ֤ם <S%H518><s%> if לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD יֶֽחֱטָא־ <S%H2398><s%> sin אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> him but if a man מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> who יִתְפַּלֶּל־ <S%H6419><s%> who shall intreat ל֑וֹ וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יִשְׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> for him? Notwithstanding they hearkened לְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> not unto the voice אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> of their father כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חָפֵ֥ץ <S%H2654><s%> would יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> because the LORD לַהֲמִיתָֽם׃ <S%H4191><s%> slay

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> And there came אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> a man אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֵלִ֑י <S%H5941><s%> unto Eli וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> unto him Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הֲנִגְלֹ֤ה <S%H1540><s%> Did I plainly נִגְלֵ֙יתִי֙ <S%H1540><s%> appear אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father בִּֽהְיוֹתָ֥ם <S%H1961><s%> were in בְּמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> when they were in Egypt לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> in Pharaoh's

וּבָחֹ֣ר <S%H977><s%> And did I choose אֹ֠תוֹ <S%H853><s%> מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁבְטֵ֨י <S%H7626><s%> him out of all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לִי֙ לְכֹהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> [to be] my priest לַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> to offer עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> to מִזְבְּחִ֗י <S%H4196><s%> upon mine altar לְהַקְטִ֥יר <S%H6999><s%> to burn קְטֹ֛רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense לָשֵׂ֥את <S%H5375><s%> to wear אֵפ֖וֹד <S%H646><s%> an ephod לְפָנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> before וָֽאֶתְּנָה֙ <S%H5414><s%> me? and did I give לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אִשֵּׁ֖י <S%H801><s%> all the offerings made by fire בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תִבְעֲט֗וּ <S%H1163><s%> Wherefore kick בְּזִבְחִי֙ <S%H2077><s%> ye at my sacrifice וּבְמִנְחָתִ֔י <S%H4503><s%> and at mine offering אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּ֖יתִי <S%H6680><s%> which I have commanded מָע֑וֹן <S%H4583><s%> [in my] habitation וַתְּכַבֵּ֤ד <S%H3513><s%> and honourest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1121><s%> thy sons מִמֶּ֔נִּי <S%H4480><s%> above לְהַבְרִֽיאֲכֶ֗ם <S%H1254><s%> above me to make yourselves fat מֵרֵאשִׁ֛ית <S%H7225><s%> with the chiefest כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every מִנְחַ֥ת <S%H4503><s%> of all the offerings יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְעַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> of my people

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Wherefore the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אָמ֣וֹר <S%H559><s%> I said אָמַ֔רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> indeed בֵּֽיתְךָ֙ <S%H1004><s%> [that] thy house וּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father יִתְהַלְּכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> should walk לְפָנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> me for עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> ever וְעַתָּ֤ה <S%H6258><s%> henceforth נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> but now the LORD חָלִ֣ילָה <S%H2486><s%> Be it far from me לִּ֔י כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מְכַבְּדַ֥י <S%H3513><s%> for them that honour אֲכַבֵּ֖ד <S%H3513><s%> me I will honour וּבֹזַ֥י <S%H959><s%> and they that despise יֵקָֽלּוּ׃ <S%H7043><s%> me shall be lightly esteemed

הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> Behold the days בָּאִ֔ים <S%H935><s%> come וְגָֽדַעְתִּי֙ <S%H1438><s%> that I will cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זְרֹ֣עֲךָ֔ <S%H2220><s%> thine arm וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זְרֹ֖עַ <S%H2220><s%> and the arm בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father's מִֽהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become זָקֵ֖ן <S%H2205><s%> that there shall not be an old man בְּבֵיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1004><s%> in thine house

וְהִבַּטְתָּ֙ <S%H5027><s%> And thou shalt see צַ֣ר <S%H6862><s%> an enemy מָע֔וֹן <S%H4583><s%> [in my] habitation בְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יֵיטִ֖יב <S%H3190><s%> in all [the wealth] which [God] shall give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become זָקֵ֛ן <S%H2205><s%> and there shall not be an old man בְּבֵיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> in thine house כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> for ever

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> I will not אַכְרִ֤ית <S%H3772><s%> of thine [whom] I shall not cut off לְךָ֙ מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> from מִזְבְּחִ֔י <S%H4196><s%> from mine altar לְכַלּ֥וֹת <S%H3615><s%> [shall be] to consume אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes וְלַאֲדִ֣יב <S%H109><s%> and to grieve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H5315><s%> thine heart וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַרְבִּ֥ית <S%H4768><s%> and all the increase בֵּיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> of thine house יָמ֥וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> shall die אֲנָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H376><s%> man

וַהֲקִימֹתִ֥י <S%H6965><s%> And I will raise me up לִי֙ כֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> priest נֶאֱמָ֔ן <S%H539><s%> a faithful כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> to what בִּלְבָבִ֥י <S%H3824><s%> according to [that] which [is] in mine heart וּבְנַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> and in my mind יַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> [that] shall do וּבָנִ֤יתִי <S%H1129><s%> and I will build לוֹ֙ בַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> house נֶאֱמָ֔ן <S%H539><s%> him a sure וְהִתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and he shall walk לִפְנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> before מְשִׁיחִ֖י <S%H4899><s%> mine anointed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> for ever

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Everyone הַנּוֹתָר֙ <S%H3498><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] every one that is left בְּבֵ֣יתְךָ֔ <S%H1004><s%> in thine house יָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> shall come לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֣ת <S%H7812><s%> [and] crouch ל֔וֹ לַאֲג֥וֹרַת <S%H95><s%> to him for a piece כֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וְכִכַּר־ <S%H3603><s%> and a morsel לָ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of bread וְאָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> and shall say סְפָחֵ֥נִי <S%H5596><s%> Put נָ֛א <S%H4994><s%> Please אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> me I pray thee into one הַכְּהֻנּ֖וֹת <S%H3550><s%> of the priests' offices לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> that I may eat פַּת־ <S%H6595><s%> a piece לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> of bread ס
